name: North Carolina Online Trivia | North Carolina | 5 Questions

questions.text: What is the capital of North Carolina?
questions.explanation:
Raleigh.

	This is where the capital buildings and many museums are. This is also where I go to school, at North Carolina State University.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT an export of NC?
questions.explanation:
bananas.

	Hog farms cover the southeastern portion of NC.

questions.text: This city is a major port and is also where many movies and the television show 'Dawson's Creek' is filmed?
questions.explanation:
Wilmington & wilmington.

	This is my hometown, and is also where the World War Two battleship USS North Carolina is docked. Also, Woodrow Wilson's father was a minister at the First Presbyterian Church in downtown Wilmington.

questions.text: Which of the following is the largest city in the state?
questions.explanation:
Charlotte.

	The other three towns are not very big at all.

questions.text: Which of the following states does not border North Carolina?
questions.explanation:
Oregon.

	Oregon is on the west coast.
